dublinCore.dc:title: 117 HR 9436 IH: To codify the Department of Labor rule regarding religious exemptions to the equal opportunity clause, and for other purposes.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Good of Virginia introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Oversight and Reform

form.official-title: To codify the Department of Labor rule regarding religious exemptions to the equal opportunity clause, and for other purposes.

section.header: Codifying the Department of Labor rule regarding religious exemptions to the equal opportunity clause
section.text: The rule issued by the Secretary of Labor on December 9, 2020, relating to Implementing Legal Requirements Regarding the Equal Opportunity Clauseâ€™s Religious Exemption (85 Fed. Reg. 79324) shall have the force and effect of law.
